content: you ll be able to crochet ghost boo toy using my pattern it will be nice for halloween you can use any other yarn you are used to crochet with just make sure to use correct hook size that corresponds to your yarn tip i use a smaller hook size than is suggested on the yarn label materials needed 1 fine cotton yarn of white brown orange and light green colors i used egitto titan wool 120 m ≈131yds /50 g 2 hook size 2 mm metal hook us 1/uk 1 3 fiber filling 4 safety eyes 7 mm 5 black sewing thread
